comment:
* This class provides the APIs to get device's advertisement data. The advertisement data might * be incomplete or not available. * *

* documentation can be found here * * @hide

methods.name: public int getDeviceMode()
methods.comment:
* Get the mode of the device based on its advertisement data.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public int getDeviceSide()
methods.comment:
* Get the side of the device based on its advertisement data.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public boolean isCsipSupported()
methods.comment:
* Check if {@link BluetoothHearingAid} marks itself as CSIP supported based on its
         * advertisement data.
         *
         * @return {@code true} when CSIP is supported, {@code false} otherwise
         * @hide

methods.name: public int getTruncatedHiSyncId()
methods.comment:
* Get the truncated HiSyncId of the device based on its advertisement data.
         *
         * @hide

methods.name: public boolean isInPairWith(@Nullable AdvertisementServiceData data)
methods.comment:
* Check if another {@link AdvertisementServiceData} is likely a pair with current one.
         * There is a possibility of a collision on truncated HiSyncId which leads to falsely
         * identified as a pair.
         *
         * @param data another device's {@link AdvertisementServiceData}
         * @return {@code true} if the devices are a likely pair, {@code false} otherwise
         * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
